name: Lone Knight: Halloween Demo
description:
In this early demo for Lone Knight, experience a spooky adventure set in an incredible low poly environment filled with swamps, dead forests, and a variety of other-worldly enemies. Play as a lone knight who has awoken in a dangerous wood to discover he doesn't know where he is, or why is there. Can you escape the woods alive?

  • Souls-like combat with the ability to lock on to nearby enemies.
  • Beautiful low poly graphics.
  • Original Halloween themed music made just for this project.
  • Variety of Halloween themed enemies.
  • Small amount of dialogue/goal provision.
  • Instructions provided within game to aid new players.
  • Small file size!

I'm a solo indie developer and handled all aspects of development with the following exceptions:

  • @The_Lucretzia
    • Post-processing
    • Town level-design
  •  @ClementPanchout
    • Music

To keep up to date with Lone Knight as well as other future projects, please be sure to follow me on the following platforms:
